message: I propose a fair split. 90% for me, 10% for you.  Let's get this over with!
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  This round is your best chance to secure a good amount, as the value decreases with each turn.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob.  55/45 split in my favor seems like a reasonable middle ground.  Let's end this quickly before the money loses more value.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I propose a fair 50/50 split. Let's end this now before we both lose out even more.
